author: Steven Skula
comment: Many apps crash after installing paid app.  Dev will not reply to email. Whipped my phone and only installed this app and crashes again. Uninstaller and no crashes. App creator will not reply or fix app.

comment: I would love it more if the ambient clock wasn't such a battery drainer. Think u can fix?
title: Love it!

comment: Same as others drains my battery very fast even selecting lower brightness, the calendar also not showing events, I hope you can fix this issues, I really like it
